brand_identity.name: UNIFY
brand_identity.mission: To unify the fragmented university admission process into a seamless, intelligent, and human-centric experience.
brand_identity.visual_archetype: Swiss & High-Contrast (Authority, Clarity) with a 'Deep Indigo' twist for Dark Mode.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all H1-H6. Weight: Bold (700) or ExtraBold (800) for H1/H2. Letter-spacing: 'tracking-tight'.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Inter' for all paragraphs, inputs, and data tables. Weight: Regular (400) or Medium (500).

primary.name: UNIFY Blue
primary.description: Vibrant electric blue. Use for primary actions (Buttons, Active States, Links).

secondary.name: Slate
secondary.description: Muted blue-grey. Use for secondary text, borders, and inactive icons.

background_light.description: Pure white for maximum clarity in Light Mode.

background_dark.description: Deep Indigo/Slate. NOT pure black. Creates a premium enterprise feel.

surface_dark.description: Lighter slate for cards/sidebars in Dark Mode.

admin_dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Fixed Left) + Topbar (Sticky) + Main Content Area (Scrollable)
admin_dashboard.grid_rules: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6. Widgets must stretch to fill height.
admin_dashboard.spacing: Dense. p-4 or p-6 for containers. gap-4 for internal lists.

student_portal.structure: Top Nav (Sticky) + Hero (Welcome) + Action Grid + Application Status Tracker
student_portal.grid_rules: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8. Use 'Hero' span for the main 'Resume Application' card.
student_portal.spacing: Generous. p-8 or p-12. Breathing room is key for reducing anxiety.

landing_page.structure: Hero (Left Text, Right 3D/Image) + Feature Grid (Bento) + Testimonials (Marquee) + Footer
landing_page.spacing: Luxurious. py-24 or py-32 for section gaps.

buttons.primary: rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95 font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.secondary: rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95 font-medium px-6 py-2.5 dark:bg-slate-800 dark:border-slate-700 dark:text-white dark:hover:bg-slate-700
buttons.ghost: rounded-md hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 transition-colors dark:hover:bg-slate-800 dark:text-slate-400 dark:hover:text-white

cards.dashboard: rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white text-slate-950 shadow-sm dark:border-slate-800 dark:bg-slate-900 dark:text-slate-50
cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl border border-slate-200 bg-white p-8 hover:border-blue-500/50 transition-colors dark:border-slate-800 dark:bg-slate-900
cards.glass: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 border border-white/20 shadow-sm dark:bg-slate-900/60 dark:border-white/10

status_badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for Sticky Headers, Modals, and Toasts. Class: 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-900/80 border-b border-slate-200/50 dark:border-slate-800/50'.
visual_enhancers.grid_borders: For Admin Dashboard tables: Use 'divide-y divide-slate-200 dark:divide-slate-800' and 'border-b border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800'.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle 'spotlight' gradients in the background for Dark Mode hero sections.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for most cards. Use 'shadow-xl' + 'shadow-blue-900/20' for floating elements or active states.

motion.micro_interactions: Active elements should scale down slightly (active:scale-95). Links should have a color shift.
motion.list_stagger: Stagger list items by 0.05s for a cascading entrance effect.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is at least 4.5:1 against background. Use 'text-slate-900' on white, 'text-white' on dark slate.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings are MANDATORY. Use 'focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-blue-600'.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present (e.g., icon buttons).

landing_hero.description: Modern university hallway with students, bright and welcoming. Use for Landing Page Hero background or side image.

student_community.description: Diverse group of students studying together. Use for 'Student Life' or 'Community' section.

tech_abstract.description: Abstract blue glowing lines. Use for 'Analytics' or 'Super Admin' login background.

library_study.description: Student studying in a grand library. Use for 'Academics' or 'Research' section.

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENT THEME TOGGLE: The app must support both Light and Dark modes. Use the 'next-themes' or a simple context provider to toggle the '.dark' class on the HTML element.
USE SHADCN COMPONENTS: You have a library in 'src/components/ui'. Use them. Do not build buttons or inputs from scratch.
CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: Override the default 'radius' in 'tailwind.config.js' to '0.5rem' (8px) for a modern but professional look.
LAYOUT SEPARATION: Create distinct layouts for 'Public' (Landing), 'Student' (Portal), and 'Admin' (Dashboard). Do not share a single layout file.
DATA DENSITY: For Admin tables, use 'compact' spacing. Do not make rows too tall. Information density is key for admins.
EMPTY STATES: Always design empty states for tables/lists. Use a simple icon + text (e.g., 'No leads found').
MOBILE RESPONSIVENESS: All grids must collapse to 1 column on mobile ('grid-cols-1'). Navigation must become a hamburger menu or bottom bar.
TEST IDS: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links. Format: 'kebab-case' (e.g., 'login-submit-btn').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid for readability.
Glassmorphism: Use it sparingly (headers, modals) to add depth.
Spacing: Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' to let content breathe.
Micro-animations: Add 'active:scale-95' to all interactive elements.
